title: Watch: Our correspondent goes into no-man's land with the Ukrainian army
description: The BBC spent a week with Ukrainian forces in Kharkiv as they fight to stop a further Russian advance.

title: Quiz of the week: Who helped Dolly write a novel?
description: How closely have you been paying attention to what's been going on during the past seven days?

title: Timbuktu manuscripts: Mali's ancient documents captured online
description: The thousands of manuscripts contain centuries of African writing on maths, medicine and more.

title: WATCH: Disposal experts defuse unexploded bomb in Ukraine
description: An unexploded 500kg (1102lb) bomb was discovered in Chernihiv in northern Ukraine.
